original_text: And you shall put the golden altar for incense before the ark of the testimony, and set up the screen for the door of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 또 금 향단을 증거궤 앞에 두고 성막 문에 휘장을 달고

sentences.original_text: And you shall put the golden altar for incense
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 분향할 금 향단을 두어야 하리라

sentences.original_text: before the ark of the testimony
for the door of the tabernacle
